name: CCMPopup
summary: The CCMPopup is a nice controller transition animation that makes the view pop from the middle of the screen
description: The CCMPopup is a nice controller transition animation that makes the view pop from the middle of the screen. It can be easily used with a segue right from storyboard, or with apples `presentViewController:animated:completion:` method, and dismissed just as easily with the `dismissViewControllerAnimated:completion:` method.
